headline: Is Bristol-Myers Squibb (BMY) Among the Cheap Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires?
summary: We recently published a list of the 15 Best and Cheap Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) stands against the other cheap stocks held by billionaires.
